content: whip up an adorable jellyfish with this no-sew crochet jellyfish pattern this quick and easy amigurumi jellyfish has all of the cuteness and none of the sewing it s a fun project for using up leftover yarn and is the perfect size for keychains and bag charms making it a great addition to your next market/craft fair or a quick gift the pdf includes detailed instructions and photos as well as easy print pages for more advanced crocheters or for a printed hard copy the free written pattern can be found here 1 on my blog **materials ** * dk weight yarn * 2 5mm crochet hook * 6mm safety eyes * black embroidery floss * polyester fiberfill * stitch marker yarn needle scissors the finished item measures approximately 4 10cm long item size may vary depending on gauge and materials used 1 https //www stitchbyfay com/crochet-jellyfish-pattern/
